event.doc_name: Third Amended Class Action Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

evidence.text: To certify the class as defined above at ¶ 52;
evidence.source_document: Third Amended Class Action Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

add_extracted.value: Certify the class as defined above

evidence.text: To declare Grants Pass’ campaign to drive homeless people out of the City unconstitutional and enjoin such practices,
evidence.source_document: Third Amended Class Action Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

add_extracted.value: Declare Grants Pass' campaign to drive homeless people out of the City unconstitutional and enjoin such practices

evidence.text: To issue a declaration that, as applied to plaintiffs, enforcement of GPMC 5.61.020 (the anti-sleeping ordinance), GPMC 5.61.030 (the anti-camping ordinance), GPMC 6.46.090 (the parks anti-camping ordinance), GPMC 6.46.350 (the park exclusion ordinance) and criminal trespass laws is an unconstitutional infringement on plaintiffs' Eighth and Fourteenth Amendment rights.
evidence.source_document: Third Amended Class Action Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

add_extracted.value: Issue a declaration that enforcement of specific ordinances is unconstitutional

evidence.text: To issue an injunction prohibiting Grants Pass from enforcement of GPMC 5.61.020 (the anti-sleeping ordinance), GPMC 5.61.030 (the anti-camping ordinance), GPMC 6.46.090 (the parks anti-camping ordinance), GPMC 6.46.350 (park exclusion ordinance) and criminal trespass laws against homeless individuals in Grants Pass who are engaged in the life sustaining activities of resting, sleeping or seeking shelter from the elements, unless and until Grants Pass provides a place where plaintiffs can lawfully engage in necessary life-sustaining activities.
evidence.source_document: Third Amended Class Action Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

add_extracted.value: Issue an injunction prohibiting enforcement of ordinances against homeless individuals unless shelter is provided

evidence.text: To award plaintiffs their costs and attorney fees, pursuant to 42 U.S.C. § 1988
evidence.source_document: Third Amended Class Action Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

evidence.text: To award plaintiffs such other relief as may be just and equitable.
evidence.source_document: Third Amended Class Action Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

add_extracted.value: Award other relief as may be just and equitable

args.reason: All 6 distinct remedies sought from the Plaintiffs' complaints have been fully extracted from the Third Amended and original Class Action Complaints (both fully visited documents). No additional remedies sought exist in the remaining unvisited documents (Docket, Judgment, Opinions), as those contain court orders/decisions rather than plaintiff's requested remedies. Checklist is complete with 6 values and no empty keys.

All 6 distinct remedies sought by plaintiffs were fully extracted from the fully visited Class Action Complaint and Third Amended Class Action Complaint (both contain plaintiff's requested remedies in PRAYER FOR RELIEF). Unvisited documents (Docket, Judgment, Opinions) contain court orders/decisions, not plaintiff's requested remedies, so no further extraction is possible or needed.
